# ipcalc Provider

Provider for the [ipcalc](https://gitlab.com/ipcalc/ipcalc)-like functionality. Requires Terraform 1.0 or later.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "ipcalc" {
  # requires no configuration
}
```
